documents.document: @badseaband My pleasure. I plugged the new video too.
Last night's show had live music from @AEMAKofficial / chats about BIMM with @anyothercity / Lots of new tunes https://t.co/khDcitnBiw
The playlist from last night's show with tracks from @thisislyra @badseaband @OldHannahMusic @FarahElleMusic https://t.co/hnaeHCZ0cl
Playing some @bitchfalcon right now!! They're live in the Workman's Club on Feb 25th #Clutch
@ItsMeEricaCody Hey Erica, am playing 'Addicted' - is that ok? John!
Playing new music tonight from @kidkaratemusic @comradehat @daclockworks and a track from the @JuniorBrotherIE EP too. 9-11pm.
Live music tonight is from @AEMAKofficial / James Byrne @anyothercity will be chatting about @BIMMDublin...new @moonlookson tune too 9-11pm
Playing brand new music tonight from @PlanetParade @GypsiesOTA @ryan_vail & @jeliofthebirds @divinecomedyhq @tebiflex @ItsMeEricaCody 9-11pm
@DavidKelly_LMMN Thanks for the shout out David. It's Barker by the way 👍
Blackfish Collective are in the same venue on Sat for their launch party. https://t.co/BBVJHLtu9V A big YES to this https://t.co/gB2pAbEBsM
Le Boom, Hilary Woods, This Side Up and Wastefellow are in Bello Bar tomorrow night for a YHRF event https://t.co/qUURI6JhEC
Go 360 degrees with us in this rather slick video from @360SeeMore of Booka Brass Band playing live on Sunday's show https://t.co/bwomBImfmp
AE Mak are live on the show this Sunday as well as James Byrne from BIMM and Any Other City. So much to talk about, should be fun. 9-11pm.
Lots of new music to check out on this week's podcast - Rejjie Snow, Lisa Hannigan, Pleasure Beach, Malojian etc https://t.co/QtVy8zPmdO
Ryan Adams talking about his new album 'Prisoner' earlier on today with Lauren Laverne. Starts at 2.09 https://t.co/RL3cloOxEr
The CAO deadline to apply for @BIMMDublin is February 1st https://t.co/FRiyEf3s4u
Really good interview with Farah Elle from the @GoldenPlec dudes https://t.co/x4KD4iulev
@dubsoulrebel Hey dude, good call on Savoy Motel. Am enjoying listening to the album.
@YoureOnlyMassiv Great song. I heard it a few days ago and realised I hadn't played it since 2015! Hope you are keeping well. John!
The playlist from last night's show with tracks from @therapyofficial @TheNotas @YoureOnlyMassiv @roisinmurphy https://t.co/tqsZDD2jDG
Here's some 360 degree photos of @BookaBrassBand from last night's show - courtesy of @360SeeMore and… https://t.co/cVqHCedfFk

@NewValleyWolves Yesssss not much room left! Such a fun band.
Booka Brass Band right now! https://t.co/uXV66YJurP
Playing new tunes tonight from these acts as well @milkysmusic @TheKlares @greywindband The Recent Riotz @DansantLabel - tune in 9-11pm.
New tunes on tonight's playlist from @PleasureBeachHQ @wecutcorners @rejjiesnow @LisaHannigan @mazzygooze @Malojian @telexplosions 9-11pm
Here's what happened the last time they were on the show in 2014 https://t.co/TjnhscMoNx
Live music tonight is from @BookaBrassBand - yes all 9 of them! They play the Jameson #BowStSessions this Thurs https://t.co/7OKsVQfvUl
Nadal is back #AusOpen ❤️
Great win today in the North Dublin Senior Soccer final beating St. Aidan's 2-1. Heroes @StFintansHS… https://t.co/yj4dMvc5hc
New @The_xx album on repeat ❤️
Thanks @USAmbIreland for your work here in Ireland the last few years - especially with the #creativeminds series which I really enjoyed.
Last night's show featured Martin Byrne from Other Voices / Live music from Bairbre Anne / Lots of new music https://t.co/1J7y1JpHyB
The playlist from last night's show featuring tracks from @myHivaOa @JonnyRepBand @alvyred @exmagician @NewPortals https://t.co/G2obhiI78N
Listen back to last night's show with live music from @bairbre_anne and @martin_byrne67 chatting about Other Voices https://t.co/1J7y1JpHyB
@bairbre_anne @98FM Was great to meet you again Bairbre Anne. G'luck in sunny Melbourne. Here's the podcast https://t.co/NwJSPqWRbM
Here's @bairbre_anne performing live on the show tonight on @98FM. Her new songs '27' and 'Selfish' sounded so good… https://t.co/I1HHeQeHsh
Brand new music tonight from @HAWKofficial @Feather_Beds @stephanierainey @202s @BadFitBand @Outsiderofficia - tune in 9-11pm.
Celebrating 7 years of presenting Totally Irish on @98FM tonight with live music from @bairbre_anne and chats with… https://t.co/xMEyoCTQTE
Fun night at @whelanslive Ones To Watch last night! Really enjoyed seeing @myHivaOa @EleMusic1 @beautysleeptalk @tebiflex @ruthlesslyRUTH ❤️
Really good first night at @whelanslive Ones To Watch last night. Especially enjoyed @PillowQueeens @_tomorrows and @thumper666.
Looking forward to checking out some new music tonight in Whelan's at Ones To Watch https://t.co/RxCyrHo81k
Live acts on the show for the rest of Jan include Booka Brass Band, Bairbre Anne and AE Mak...plus Martin Byrne of Other Voices.
@AmDuffin Yes prodding away while Cave watches and Shane reacts. It almost reads like a script at times.
@AmDuffin That's a great read. Hilarious at times.
Really surprised that there wasn't a place for Róisín Murphy on there but decent list all the same.
Congrats to all the acts nominated for this year's Choice Music Prize https://t.co/4k9sVNBgc7
Here's a link to the podcast of the show if you missed it. Features live music + chat with Tomorrows & Pillow Queens https://t.co/SfqdyeIedP
The playlist from Sunday's show with tracks from @siightsofficial @Diosco_Na_Mbo @mazzygooze @thirteenthlock https://t.co/YYuQnXYL9x
@david__dooley 100% agree...Ok cool i'm definitely going Thurs & Fri. If i make Sat too i'll check out your set. Hope it goes well for you.
@david__dooley The trend lately has been to go with signed commercial acts though. What day are you guys playing Ones To Watch?
@david__dooley @choiceprize @OvrhdThAlbtrss Yes me too! Great album. I'd have Windings in there as well.
Here's the 10 acts i think the judges will go for in tomorrow's @choiceprize nominations. #RTEChoiceMusic https://t.co/rqgykb971x
@schlafshane @SouleOfficial Yessss she's super talented.
Played this last night on the show. Really good. https://t.co/xiYmp0CksO
@_tomorrows Thanks for coming in last night lads. Great to see you all again! Good luck in @whelanslive this Thursday.
@PillowQueeens Was lovely to meet the three of you. It was a fun interview! The pic is on the podcast page too. See… https://t.co/E1jt9OX6uL
Listen back to last night's show with live music and banter from @_tomorrows & @PillowQueeens and lots of new tunes. https://t.co/SfqdyeIedP
Also on tonight's show we'll be playing you a @Dysto_Warriors remix of 'King' by @ellajoymusic @ColdHillRecords - 9-11pm.
Live music tonight is from @_tomorrows & @PillowQueeens and we've new singles from @JoeChester_ @COLUMBIAMILLS @alvyred @BlackFishCo 9-11pm!
@hatchetcol @Daraghmclove To go with some of the best Guinness.
Would also recommend going to @IMMAIreland to see the Lucian Freud collection on display. https://t.co/DQJj8zsY30
If you're visiting Lisbon check out the newly opened MAAT https://t.co/drIyANex4O - museum with great exhibitions +… https://t.co/roZHOWYjH2
We've live music and chat on the show this Sunday from Tomorrows and Pillow Queens. 9-11pm. https://t.co/U1waVpfYMi
New Dirty Projectors single is so good ❤️https://t.co/7xNVtaZ3dN
@rachwritesstuff @windings Hey Rachel, yessss especially played really really loud. It's their Song 2. #WindingsTheIrishBlur
@Dysto_Warriors Hi, yes please. My email address is john.barker@98fm.com - thanks!
Check out the new video from @windings for their song 'Boring' https://t.co/jqCDHmYNvC #ChickenShit
Kicking off a two hour selection of some of my favourite radio songs with Japanese Popstars 'Let's Go'.
New Year's Day Special on the way from 9pm with some of my favourite tracks of the last few years. Listen online:… https://t.co/7PZPSPazJP
@TheDavidClear You must have finished off the biscuits watching that. #NoneLeftForTheKids
@Mescalitomusic @98FM Happy Christmas lads. Thanks for coming in.
Our Top Ten Albums of 2016 featured @alltvvins @jamesvmcmorrow @roisinmurphy @RusanganoFamily https://t.co/yj5hFeiN5Y
@hatchetcol Hey Colm! Best of luck with the next adventure.
Last night's show had live music from Mescalito and Paddy Hanna & Floor Staff. SYRIAS VIBES fundraiser is tonight https://t.co/ffQFhWVX72
Tonight's fundraiser for @syriasvibes in @WorkmansDublin is €10 on the door and there's a great raffle with prizes… https://t.co/TwAKUfRkuw
On last night's show Calvin James from @syriasvibes and @Paddyhanna & @FloorStaff chatted about tonight's fundraiser https://t.co/ffQFhWVX72
We chose our Top 10 Albums of 2016 on the show last night. @wecutcorners @windings @BellX1 @funeralsuits https://t.co/yj5hFeiN5Y
Counting down our Top Ten Albums Of The Year. At number 10 @_tomorrows and now playing 'Big River Man' from @OvrhdThAlbtrss - they're no 9!
We've also got live music from @Paddyhanna and @FloorStaff who play the fundraiser for @syriasvibes in… https://t.co/IK9xYO7svO
We've live music tonight from @Mescalitomusic and Bettine from @knockanstockan will be chatting about the KS Xmas party. Tune in 9-11pm.
A Retweet. @StFintansSport https://t.co/bBss5Ftbic
Last night's show had live music from @GypsiesOTA and @Supersillymusic as well as some of the best releases of 2016: https://t.co/0u4hmRfdSU
@OtherkinOK Good seeing you on Fri night Luke. Roll on 2017. #Clontarf4Ever
We're playing some of our favourite 2016 tracks this hour with music from @HARESQUEAD @OtherkinOK @tobykaar @BADBONESMUSIC @daithimusic
We're playing some of our favourite 2016 tracks this hour with music from @TooFools @Jenevansmusic @alvyred @SorchaRichardsn @b_o_n_z_a_i
Live music tonight is from @GypsiesOTA and @Supersillymusic and we've a 'Best Songs Of 2016' after 10 o'clock. Tune in 9-11pm.
Great fun at Hard Rock Cafe last night for the Totally Irish @98FM Christmas party. Overhead, The Albatross were am… https://t.co/t2R3X77BbT
Going to see @OCSmusic tonight in @olympiatheatre nearly 20 years after i saw them there in 1997. Hair not as long… https://t.co/XAAV0jMkX7
Listen back to last night's show featuring a review of 2016 by @TPOEblog and live music from @youthmass https://t.co/s5g9jlLAjq
"But you can't ignore the Sparks..." - finishing off tonight's show with some old school @tigercooke. Thanks for listening ❤️
We have some @white_mice on the way right now as well as some @hvmmingbyrd @heroesinhiding @fightlikeapes @funeralsuits and @LandLovers
Here's @youthmass performing on the show in 2011. https://t.co/dqfKyPlVXD
We're going to be taking a look back at Irish music in 2016 with Eoghan O'Sullivan from @TPOEblog - tune in from 9pm.
Live music tonight is from @youthmass and we've brand new tunes from @thirteenthlock @WdeBurca @NaoiseRoo and As Humans...Tune in 9-11pm.
Youth Mass's new single is called 'Somebody Help Me' https://t.co/hmvCsyh0vl
Tomorrow's show features Eoghan O'Sullivan (The Point Of Everything) chatting about the Best of 2016 and live music from YOUTH MASS. 9-11pm.
Tickets for next Friday's Totally Irish Christmas Party are booked. Looking forward to seeing @OvrhdThAlbtrss and @bitchfalcon in Vicar St 🍺
Also played a track last night from the new EP by Belfast musician @_LittleRivers - check out the full EP here: https://t.co/A5hmjc0mTx
Last night's show featured SOULÉ live and new tunes from White Collar Boy, The Strypes, Funeral Suits and The Notas https://t.co/E3PAEsYw9M
